description: A real‑estate agent uploads a property address and requests Scandinavian‑style staging using only eco‑friendly furniture and materials. The assistant orchestrates photo retrieval, room analysis, trend research, sustainable catalog search, image synthesis, and cloud storage, finally delivering URLs to the staged images.

messages.content: You are StageVision AI, an autonomous virtual‑home‑staging assistant. Use the available tools to fetch property photos, analyse rooms, discover current design trends, search partner catalogs for sustainable furniture, generate depth‑aware staged images, and store the results. Respond to the user with clear next‑step explanations and the final image URLs.
I have a new listing at 456 Oak Lane, Portland, OR. I'd like the staging to use eco‑friendly materials—sustainable fabrics, recycled wood, etc.—and I'd love a Scandinavian style.
Got it! I’ll start by fetching the latest photos for the property so I can analyse each room.
{"photo_urls": ["https://storage.example.com/456oak/livingroom.jpg", "https://storage.example.com/456oak/kitchen.jpg"]}
Thanks! I’ll analyse the two rooms to get dimensions, wall colours, and current furniture placements.

{"dimensions": {"width": 5.2, "depth": 4.8, "height": 2.7}, "wall_color": "#f5f5f5", "floor_type": "hardwood", "existing_furniture": ["old sofa", "coffee table"], "placement_zones": [{"zone": "center", "size": "large"}]}

{"dimensions": {"width": 3.6, "depth": 3.0, "height": 2.7}, "wall_color": "#ffffff", "floor_type": "tile", "existing_furniture": [], "placement_zones": [{"zone": "left", "size": "medium"}, {"zone": "right", "size": "medium"}]}
Great, I have the room specs. Now I’ll look up the latest Scandinavian design trends for Spring 2025 to ensure the staging feels fresh and on‑brand.
{"color_palette": ["#E0E5EC", "#A7C4BC", "#D9B8A5"], "materials": ["recycled wood", "organic cotton", "linen"], "key_furniture": ["low‑profile sofa", "round coffee table", "simple dining chairs"]}
Using the trends, I’ll now search our partnered catalogs for sustainable items that match the Scandinavian style.
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "SOFA_001", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.example.com/thumbs/sofa_001.jpg", "price": 1150, "sustainability": "recycled polyester fabric, reclaimed wood frame"}]}
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "TABLE_045", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.example.com/thumbs/table_045.jpg", "price": 450, "sustainability": "100% recycled wood top, bamboo legs"}]}
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "CHAIR_22", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.example.com/thumbs/chair_22.jpg", "price": 275, "sustainability": "organic cotton upholstery, reclaimed pine frame"}]}
I’ve selected one sustainable sofa, coffee table, and dining chair that fit the Scandinavian look. I’ll now generate staged images for each room using these pieces.
{"image_base64": "iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA..."}
{"image_base64": "iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA..."}
The staged scenes are ready. I’ll now store them in a folder for your project.
{"url": "https://cdn.example.com/EcoScandinavian/456_Oak_Lane/livingroom_staged.png"}
{"url": "https://cdn.example.com/EcoScandinavian/456_Oak_Lane/kitchen_staged.png"}

All set! Here are the eco‑friendly, Scandinavian‑styled staged images for the listing:

- Living Room: https://cdn.example.com/EcoScandinavian/456_Oak_Lane/livingroom_staged.png
- Kitchen: https://cdn.example.com/EcoScandinavian/456_Oak_Lane/kitchen_staged.png

You can download and use these images in your MLS listing or marketing materials. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or additional rooms staged.
